action.action-desc: Mr. Cornyn (for himself and Mr. Padilla) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To amend the Research and Development, Competition, and Innovation Act to clarify the definition of foreign country for purposes of malign foreign talent recruitment restriction, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the United States Research Protection Act of 2025.

section.header: Clarification of definition of foreign country for purposes of malign foreign talent recruitment restriction
section.text: Paragraph (4) of section 10638 of title VI of division B of the Research and Development, Competition, and Innovation Act (42 U.S.C. 19237) is amended—

paragraph.text: by inserting of concern after foreign country each place such term appears;
by striking means— and all that follows through any program, position, or activity and inserting means any program, position, or activity;
by redesignating clauses (i) through (ix) as subparagraphs (A) through (I), respectively, and moving such subparagraphs, as so redesignated, two ems to the left;
in the matter preceding subparagraph (A), as so redesignated, by striking directly provided and inserting whether directly or indirectly provided; and
in subparagraph (I), as so redesignated, by striking ; and and inserting a period.
